attributes.action: listen to the British public ...and QUIT!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The local elections and recent by-election have clearly laid out a message for Gordon Brown to listen to, which he keeps telling us he'll do. But the message isn't "to lead us through this time of..." but quite clearly to quit, now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
